posts.post_title: For Sale / For Trade - T201's (Cobb / Matty / HOF) REDUCED!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Andrews
I have the following T201's for outright sale or I'd consider trading for my wants in T205 or E121 Series of 80.  Specifically I'd be interested in the following cards:

T205:
Joss
Speaker

E121 (Series of 80 Only!):
Cobb
Johnson
Frisch
Gleason
Heilmann
Hooper
Hornsby
Hoyt
Huggins
Maranville 
Roush
Sisler
Speaker
Giants / Yankees Players that I don't have

The T201's that I have are in really nice condition.  They include:

Wheat / Bergen - VGEX - $87 - Very light lower right corner wrinkle.
Hartzell / Blair - EX+ - $80
Huggins / Breshnahan - EXMT - $390
Mathewson / Bridwell - EX - $410 - A few light surface indentation (pencil point size) that don't break the paper
Brown / Hofman - EX+ - $155
* Clarke / Byrne - EX - $130 * SOLD
Evers / Chance - EX - $220
Chase / Sweeney - EX - $90
Cicotte / Thoney - EX+ - $145
Crawford / Cobb - EX+ - $1,175
Lord / Daugherty - VGEX - $100 - Very faint lower right corner wrinkle
Killian / Fitzpatrick - VGEX - $45 - Very light lower right corner wrinkle
* Grant / McLean - VGEX - $45 - Very faint lower left corner wrinkle * SOLD
Lush / Hauser - EX - $70 - A couple of light surface indentations (pencil point size) that don't break the paper
* Miller / Herzog - VGEX - $45 - light wrinkle at bottom of card * SOLD
Summers / Jennings - EX+ - $135
Lake / Wallace - EX+ - $135
